<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4579</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Largent de Poche</string>
            <string language="es">Largent de Poche</string>
            <string language="ga">Largent de Poche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Largent de Poche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Largent de Poche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Largent de Poche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Largent de Poche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Largent de Poche</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Vocabulary building exercise aimed at preparing students for the Leaving Cert. It treats the often-used topic of pocket money and gives the necessary vocabulary and verbs to enable the student to talk easily about the subject.</string>
            <string language="es">Ejercicio para la creación de vocabulario que tiene como objeto preparar a los estudiantes para el Certificado Leaving. Trata el asunto del dinero de bolsillo, a menudo tan utilizado, y ofrece el vocabulario  y los verbos necesarios para permitir que los</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht chun foclóir a fheabhsú dírithe ar dhaltaí atá ag réiteachdon Ardteist.  Pléann se topaic coiteann an airgid phóca agus tugann sé an foclóir agus na briathair a theastaíonn le go bhféadfaidh na daltaí labairt go héasca ar an ábhar.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">French</string>
            <string language="es">Francés. Vocabulario. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Fraincis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Vocabulary</string>
            <string language="ga">Foclóir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatzgebäudeübung strebte an, 
Kursteilnehmer für das verlassende CERT vorzubereiten. Sie 
behandelt das häufig benutzte Thema des Tasche Geldes und gibt den 
notwendigen Wortschatz und die Verben, um den Kursteilnehmer zu 
aktivieren, über das Thema leicht zu sprechen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'exercice de bâtiment de vocabulaire a visé à
préparer des étudiants pour le CERT partant. Il traite le 
sujet employé souvent de l'argent de poche et donne le vocabulaire et
les verbes nécessaires pour permettre à l'étudiant de parler 
facilement au sujet du sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O exercício do edifício do vocabulário visou 
preparar estudantes para o CERT saindo. Trata o tópico usado 
frequentemente do dinheiro de bolso e dá o vocabulário e os verbos 
necessários para permitir o estudante de falar fàcilmente sobre o 
assunto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'esercitazione della costruzione di vocabolario 
ha puntato su preparare gli allievi per il CERT andante. Tratta 
il soggetto usato spesso dei soldi di tasca e dà il vocabolario ed i 
verbi necessari per permettere all'allievo di comunicare facilmente 
circa l'oggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκηση οικοδόμησης λεξιλογίου που στοχεύει στην 
προετοιμασία των σπουδαστών για την αναχώρηση Cert. 
Μεταχειρίζεται το συχνά-χρησιμοποιημένο θέμα του 
χαρτζηλικιού και δίνει το απαραίτητα λεξιλόγιο και τα ρήματα για 
να επιτρέψει στο σπουδαστή για να μιλήσει εύκολα για το θέμα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Französisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Français</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Francês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Francese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γαλλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
